title: Sarah Frier on Facebook Fake News (Audio)
itunes:title: Sarah Frier on Facebook Fake News (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo) \u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Sarah Frier\u0010Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss her story on Facebook automating their effort to flag fake news for fact checking.
